about_the_game:
Missions and Challenges: Your task is to uncover illegal schemes and find contraband in the airport. You will embark on various missions, including covert searches, passenger interrogations, and luggage analysis. Solve puzzles to uncover hidden items and evidence. Your skills of observation and analysis will be key to successfully completing tasks. You will use advanced equipment to detect violations and protect the airport's security. Your actions will play a crucial role in preventing criminal activities and maintaining order at this crucial transportation hub.

Diverse Equipment: The game provides you access to a wide range of police technology and tools for detecting contraband. From X-ray scanners and night vision cameras to metal detectors and police dogs, you have everything you need to carry out your tasks. With each mission, the level of difficulty will increase, demanding agility, thoroughness, and professionalism to ensure the safety of the airport and its passengers.

Character Development: Gradually increase your level and gain access to new skills and equipment. Improve your character to become a true expert in contraband detection. Each achievement in your career as a police agent at the airport will not only bring you bonuses and enhanced capabilities but also more challenging assignments. Your path to professional mastery and upholding the law at the airport will be a real adventure.

A Variety of Contraband Goods: You can expect a variety of contraband goods, from drugs and weapons to smuggled animals and counterfeit documents. You'll need to explore various methods and places where contraband can be hidden. These may include false compartments in luggage, hidden pockets in passengers' clothing, special containers with double bottoms, and even the internal organs of live couriers. Your ability to decipher the cunning methods and schemes of smugglers will be your real advantage.

Difficulty and Dynamics: The game offers various levels of difficulty, ranging from simple searches to complex operations to apprehend violators. The dynamic gameplay will require you to make quick decisions and act against the clock.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Airport Contraband Police is a game that allows you to step onto the front lines of the battle against illegal contraband trafficking at an international airport. As a police, you're responsible for ensuring security and preventing the smuggling of illegal goods and materials across the border.
